acceptance_criteria.detail: All required baseline checks were executed through rch offload.
evidence: RCH-BASELINE-010 events show each required command starting via rch
checks[].command values: cargo fmt --check, cargo check --all-targets, cargo clippy --all-targets -- -D warnings

acceptance_criteria.detail: Results include deterministic provenance (timestamp, trace_id, command, exit codes, durations, logs).
Failure reports include actionable failing target/lint signals and reproduction commands.
evidence: cargo_check_all_targets.log includes E0599/E0423/E0499/E0502 and compile-target failures
cargo_clippy_all_targets.log includes hard failures under -D warnings and compile-target failures
cargo_fmt_check.log includes concrete file-level formatting diffs

verification_runs.name: baseline_rch_sequence
verification_runs.summary: bd-2a3 baseline sequence: FAIL (0/3 checks passed)

remediation_hints: Formatting drift: run `rch exec -- cargo fmt` and re-check with `rch exec -- cargo fmt --check`.
Digest trait import failures (E0599): import `sha2::Digest`/`hmac::Mac` where constructors like `Sha256::new()` are used.
Capability construction failures (E0423): update enum construction sites to current API shape.
Borrow checker failures (E0499/E0502): avoid mutable logging while immutable borrows are alive (collect data first, log after iteration).
